title: Two Steps to Speed Up Your Phone
answer:
**Two Steps to Speed Up Your Phone**

You can speed up your phone by two simple steps. These steps apply to all Android phones. 

Step 1: Display the developer options. 

Go to **Settings** and slide all the way down to the bottom. Touch **About phone**, and touch **Android version** for more than five consecutive times until "You are now a developer" is displayed. Then return to **Settings**. 

Step 2: Optimize the phone settings. 

Touch **Developer options** and slide down. 

Touch **Window animation scale**, and select **0.5x**. 

Touch **Transition animation scale**, and select **0.5x**. 

Touch **Animator duration scale**, and select **1.5x**. 

The procedure is complete. 

After the preceding settings, your phone will run smoothly and faster than before.
keywords: Two Steps to Speed Up Your Phone
